sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Circuit Court Judges Travel Expense Act.

sections.heading: The judges and associate judges of the circuit courts shall be allowed
sections.text:
travel expenses when traveling outside their county of residence in
connection with their judicial duties in any of the circuits. In addition
associate judges shall be allowed travel expenses when traveling within
their county of residence in connection with their judicial duties. All
expense vouchers shall be submitted to the Supreme Court for approval.
